sage-border.description: System border style mixin. If empty, maps to the default value `rem(1px) solid sage-color(grey, 300)`

sage-breakpoint.description: Breakpoint value for min-width or max-width sizes. If empty, maps to the default value `sm-max` (767px)

sage-color-combo.description: Sage color combos. Note that not all color types are available for combinations.

sage-container.description: Sage container size mixin. If empty, defaults to `md` (1200px)

sage-font-size.description: Sage font-size mixin. If empty, defaults to `md`

sage-font-weight.description: Sage font-weight mixin. If empty, defaults to `regular`

sage-grid-template.description: Sage grid-template mixin. Uses predefined grid configurations based on morse code

sage-letter-spacing.description: Sage letter spacing mixin. When empty, will default to `sm` / rem(0.3px)

sage-line-height.description: Sage line-height value. If empty, will default to `md` / sage-baseline(7)

sage-shadow.description: Sage box-shadow value. If empty, defaults to `md`

sage-spacing.description: Sage spacing value. Empty values default to `md` / rem(24px)

sage-z-index.description: Output system z-index value. Empty values are set to `default` (0) and can be optionally incremented
